æ³¨æ„ï¼Œfloydçš„å¤–å±‚ä¸­è½¬ç‚¹æ˜¯æ²¡æœ‰é¡ºåºè¦æ±‚çš„ï¼Œåªè¦éƒ½éå†ä¸€éå°±å¯ä»¥äº†ã€‚å› ä¸ºæ—©æ™šéƒ½è¦éå†ä¸€éã€‚å¦‚æœåˆ»æ¿çš„å»æ€è€ƒä» 111 å¼€å§‹å•è°ƒé€’å¢çš„floydæ¨¡ç‰ˆå¯¹è§£å†³æœ¬é¢˜æ˜¯æ²¡æœ‰ä¸æ¯«å¸®åŠ©çš„ã€‚

ä»£ç 

#include <iostream>

using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
const ll MAXN = 505;
ll dp[MAXN][MAXN], x[MAXN], n, ans[MAXN];
bool add[MAXN];

int main() {
    scanf("%lld", &n);
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {
        for (int j = 1; j <= n; ++j) {
            scanf("%lld", &dp[i][j]);
        }
    }
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {
        scanf("%lld", &x[i]);
    }
    for (ll k = n; k >= 1; --k) {
        add[x[k]] = true;
        for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {
            for (int j = 1; j <= n; ++j) {
                dp[i][j] = min(dp[i][j], dp[i][x[k]] + dp[x[k]][j]);
            }
        }
        ll sum = 0;
        for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {
            for (int j = 1; j <= n; ++j) {
                if (add[i] && add[j]) {
                    sum += dp[i][j];
                }
            }
        }
        ans[k] = sum;
    }
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {
        cout << ans[i] << " ";
    }
    return 0;
}
